content: the morning glow wrap is a simple yet stylish piece for your handmade wardrobe it was made using a hand-dyed yarn by high desert yarn in soft peachy/apricot and pale yellow hues and captures the essence of a tranquil morning sunrise the lacy design and use of lightweight yarn ensures comfort and breathability making it an ideal accessory for summer wear it s a versatile piece that can effortlessly elevate any outfit whether you re strolling along the beach heading to the office or attending a summer garden party it is also a part of the morning glow wrap cal happening june 3-17 2024 and will be available free on my blog measures about 60 x 16 materials needed #3 dk yarn @690 if using one color or @460 yds mc @230 cc us h hook 5 mm if you would like to join my facebook group to share your make www facebook com/groups/simplymelaniejane sign up for my newsletter here https //bit ly/smjnewsletter this pattern and its images are copyright protected and the sole property of simply melanie jane please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or alter it to claim as your own you may sell any products you create from this pattern please credit the designer by linking online listings
